meanings.definition: A person who shares a room with another person.
meanings.sent1: My roommate and I share a bedroom in our apartment.
meanings.sent2: I have a roommate who sleeps in the same room as me.
meanings.sent3: My roommate always borrows my clothes without asking!
meanings.sent4: Having a good roommate is like having a built-in friend.
meanings.sent5: I can always count on my roommate to keep me company.

meanings.definition: A person who shares living quarters with another.
meanings.sent1: My roommate and I split the rent for our apartment.
meanings.sent2: Living with a roommate can help save money on housing costs.
meanings.sent3: My roommate is a great cook and always makes delicious meals.
meanings.sent4: Having a roommate means you never have to feel lonely at home.
meanings.sent5: I enjoy chatting with my roommate about our day while watching TV together.
